names.pinyin: zhi fei jie he ke tan xue fang

actions: Moistens the Lungs and stops coughing.
With Chuan Bei Mu, for coughing and chest pain due to Phlegm Heat.
Astringes the leakage of Blood, stops bleeding nourishes the Lungs and resolves Phlegm.
With Bai Bu, for hemoptysis due to Lung Yin Deficiency.
With Chuan Bei Mu, for hematemesis and hemoptysis associated with Lung abscess and consumption.
With San Qi, for bleeding from injury to the Lung collaterals.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm, stops coughing and nourishes and moistens the Lungs.
Tonifies Lung Qi and augments Kidney Jing.
Stops bleeding and transforms Blood Stasis.
With Bai Ji, for hematemesis, hemoptysis, epistaxis and hematuria.

syndromes: Hemoptysis due to Lung Yin Deficiency with Heat

symptoms: Recurrent hemoptysis with frothy, fresh, red Blood
Hoarse voice, low voice or loss of voice

notes: Grind the ingredient into a powder and take three times a day, one hour after eating.
